item.title: [COLOR orchid]造[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]CRICKET STREAMS[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (DL)[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR orchid]造[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import site,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return import re,requests page_data = requests.get('https://daddyhd.com/').text page_data = page_data.split('>Cricket<',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('>Boxing<',1)[0] e = re.findall('<hr>([^<]*)|href="([^"]*)(?s).*?ner">([^<]*)', page_data) return e

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client url = client.external('[makelist.param2]') return url

dir.title: [COLOR orchid]造[/COLOR] [COLOR white]CRICKET [/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] LIVE DIRECTS[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid]造[/COLOR]
